text: Avante (Portuguese: "forwards") can refer to: *Avante!, a Portuguese Communist newspaper *Avante International Optical scan voting system *Hyundai Elantra, also known as the Hyundai Avante *Tamiya Avante, a 1/10-scale radio-controlled buggy introduced by MRC-Tamiya in 1988 *Avante (album), Portuguese-language album by the singer Joelma 2016 *Avante, Portuguese-language album by Siba (singer) 2012 *Avante (political party), a political party in Brazil
title: Avante (disambiguation)
